uk.co.saiman.data.msapex

Class ContinuousFunctionSeries

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.saiman.data.msapex.ContinuousFunctionSeries

  • public class ContinuousFunctionSeries
extends Object
    A mapping from a ContinuousFunction to a XYChart.Series. The series is backed by the function in that changes in the function will be reflected in the series. The series is only updated as frequently as necessary to achieve a real-time image.

    The series is only created over a given view range, and to a given resolution, to avoid unnecessary computation.

      • makeDirty

        public void makeDirty()
        Flag the series as out of date with respect to the rendering environment or continuous function state.

      • refresh

        public boolean refresh()
        Clear the dirty flag, if present, and ensure the latest continuous function for rendering is up to date.
        Returns:
        true if the latest continuous function for rendering has changed, false otherwise

      • render

                   int resolution)
        Render the latest continuous function into the series for the given range and resolution.
        Parameters:
        domain - the range to render through in the domain
        resolution - the resolution to render at in the domain
